Text: UrgentApproval for disposition of Ildong Country Club MembershipJamespst Kim Gil HyungHR Admin Team PM Dear Directors and Auditors of SKEnron At the th meeting of Board of Directors held on nd May the Directors and Auditor present there have disscussed the disposition of Ildong country club membership of SK Gas but it was not resolved However it needs an urgent motion due to the nature of deal Please find the minutes attached and make sure whether you Directors approve it or not by this return email as soon as possible Best Regards Kim Gil Hyung See attached file minutesdoc minutesdoc
